short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes everything distracting from Twitter, allowing you to tweet without losing focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an app for those wanting to stay productive while also maintaining a Twitter presence. Tweet To The Void removes from the browser the following elements from all twitter pages when they load:
 - The feed/stream
 - Notifications
 - Navigation links to distracting pages
 - Profile timeline and media
 - Profile statistics
 - Twitter Analytics
 - Moments
 - Search
 - Trends

What remains after all these features are removed?
 - Tweeting
 - Direct messaging
 - Edit your profile
 - Settings

Don't worry about people liking or retweeting your tweets.

Forget about retweeting other people to gain followers.

No distractions, more productivity.


Possible future features:
 - Improve timing to remove objects popping into view briefly
 - Toggle off direct messaging access
 - Stop Twitter from updating tab name for updates.
 - Set times during the day or week that Twitter will be unlocked.
 - Push notifications at beginning of unlocked period.
 - Enable daily/weekly timeout that enables app after time limit reached
